name: Crazy Dreamz: MagiCats Edition
description:
Who has never wanted to create a magical universe reflecting his personality?

You are a MagiCat, a powerful cat wizard who wants to build awesome catstrusctions, and become the most influent MagiCat Builder!
Achieve the levels created by your friends and become the most respected MagiCat Fighter!


Crazy Dreamz is a Sandbox Platformer with the incredible ability to build what you want [/ b]. Crazy Dreamz is a maker where you will simply create beautiful levels with your imagination as the only limit.
While creating your own level you can modify the behavior of all enemies as well as the elements of decors that you integrate thanks to the introduction of code in-game [/ b]. This innovation allows everyone to have fun creating, developing their imagination while learning the logic of programming in a playful way.

With this game, our goal is to make everyone discover coding, that it’s easy and powerful. We want to arouse the curiosity of people on this subject. We are convinced that knowing the logic of programming will become more and more important in the coming years.

Enjoy!
